model

Class BoardStatic

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board
      • model.BoardStatic

  • public class BoardStatic
extends Board
    This class represents the static gameboard. It extends Board
    Author:
    Ali Arfan, Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen, Stian Tornholm Grimsgaard

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardStatic

        public BoardStatic(int columns,
                   int rows)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        BoardStatic 
         public BoardStatic(int columns, int rows)

        Sets the columns and rows according to the parameters, if they are greater than 1. Also creates a new gameboard.

        Parameters:
        columns - - the columns to be set.
        rows - - the rows to be set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - If the columns and rows are negative.
